goals.active: Find Steag Frostbeard and retrieve the Sanguinary Blade.
goals.complete: Sieran and I retrieved the Sanguinary Blade from Steag Frostbeard. Sieran's managed to contain the sword so it can't corrupt anyone, and now we just have to take the blade back to Gixx.

goals.active: Take the Sanguinary Blade to the Durmand Priory.
goals.complete: Back at the Durmand Priory, we gave the Sanguinary Blade to Gixx. Hopefully, the researchers can run tests on the blood, and find some weakness to use against the Elder Dragons.
